name: aki310-slides
description: Personal Slidev presentations with advanced tag management and customization features

scripts.build: npm run build:slides && npm run build:index && npm run build:previews
scripts.build:slides: npm run build:sre-next-2025 && npm run build:slidev-system
scripts.build:sre-next-2025: cd slides/sre-next-2025/src && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:slidev-system: cd slides/slidev-system/src && npm install && npm run build
scripts.generate-previews:local: npm run build:slides && npm run generate-previews:dev
scripts.update-previews: npm run generate-previews:local && git add dist/previews/ && git commit -m 'ğŸ–¼ï¸ Update preview images' && git push
